# cupersonnel

The goal of cupersonnel is to facilitate analysis of University of Colorado personnel data.

## Installation

Install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jayhesselberth/cupersonnel")
```
## Example

Here's the disibution of CU salaries across campuses:

```{r campus_salaries, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(cupersonnel)
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
library(ggridges)

cu_personnel %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = funding, y = campus, fill = campus)) +
  geom_density_ridges(alpha = 0.4) + 
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1")
```
